humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides a tumor size of 2.6 x 2 x 1.8 cm. According to the rules, T2 tumors are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the pathologic T stage of the patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The tumor size was measured as 2.6 x 2 x 1.8 cm, which falls within the T2 category (T2: Tumor size 2.0-5.0 cm). Therefore, the T stage from this report is T2.
